ingredientsDesc:
Lite reagent: vancomycin (~6 ng/mL) coupled to bovine serum albumin labeled with acridinium ester in buffered saline with sodium azide (<0.1%) and preservatives
Solid phase: monoclonal mouse anti-vancomycin (~6.7 μg/mL) covalently coupled to paramagnetic particles in buffered saline with sodium azide (<0.1%) and preservatives
Calibrators: after reconstitution, low or high levels of vancomycin in human serum with sodium azide (<0.1%) and preservatives
applicantName: 西門子醫療設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市南港區園區街3號2樓之2
efficacy: 用於體外診斷，利用ADVIA CentaurTM 系統定量測定血清或血漿中的萬古黴素濃度。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: A.3950 萬古黴素試驗系統
